author: Teppo Ruokosalmi
comment: Works great, simple & efficient. If you're planning on timing on an Android Wear device, note that you have to keep the app running (not enough just to have it installed) on a connected device (e.g. phone), otherwise you'll get a "Connection failed"-notification. Might be nice to have it start / stop the app on a connected device from your Android Wear device if it isn't running yet..?

author: Cody Diehl
comment: Lol this is a good way to get a fist to the head by a screaming wife. Being on your watch while she's contracting.... Good luck folks.
title: Lol

author: Robert Gibbens
comment: Great app. Nice UI design, works on multiple devices, including watches... Perfect app for tracking the most important minutes of your life. :)
title: Perfect
